creditline: The Mary Ruth Weisel Endowment for Africa, Oceania, and the Americas and gift of Robert T. Coffland in memory of Mary Hunt Kahlenberg
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: rectangular panel; cream colored; black designs; one side has large radiating diamonds with short parallel lines surrounding them; other side has bar of bowtie shapes with parallel lines inside and bar with curving groups of parallel lines
inscription: on back at one corner and center in blue ink: IC
title: Barkcloth panel
